segments.text: I've run out of steam . To be honest , I want to be in a different environment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I don't want to be stuck in a rut . I want to move on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I want to get a better job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you tell me why you want to quit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm quitting because of the lousy salary and all the difficulties I have in getting along with my colleagues .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that sounds terrible . Would you be happier with higher pay here ? I'm sure something can be worked out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid not . I've promised my girlfriend . We're going to travel south to find jobs that offer higher pay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I'd like to say that I've really enjoyed working with you.However , I think you should work harder at your new job and then you can ask for higher pay .
segments.speaker: S2
